thread.section_title: Science News and Analysis - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: The 10-Point.

author: Gerard Baker
title: The 10-Point.
text:
Good morning,
Midnight Train to Beijing
North Korean leader Kim Jong Un met Chinese President Xi Jinping this week during a surprise trip to Chinaâ€”a visit some contend is an attempt to mend fences with Beijing ahead of a planned summit with President Trump. It was believed to be his first foreign trip and first meeting with another world leader since taking power in 2011. Mr. Kim met Mr. Xi and other senior officials to discuss bilateral ties and tensions on the Korean Peninsula, Chinese state media said. Mr. Kim told Mr. Xi...
